name: BalloonBoom
description:
Description

It's a contest between 2 friends that want to make the best party in the world!

Collect as many balloons as you can, to create the best party.

Your own  or neutral color (green) balloons give you points, and if you catch your friend's balloons, don't worry! you won't lose any points, you are just preventing your friend from having them.

Run, jump, collect balloons, and most importantly - enjoy!

Play and party on!

How the game relates to the restriction?

Easy - we are collecting balloons!

Credits for external assets

Font Press start 2P:

 designed by: CodeMan38

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P?query=pre

controls

P1 jump: up arrow

P1 right: right arrow

P1 left: left arrow

P2 jump: w

P2 right: d

P2 left: a

That's it, enjoy!
